summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated catalogue web app with colorful UI and enhanced PDF brochure. Successfully verified mobile responsive design fixes, blue-purple gradient theme implementation, United Copier footer details, and PDF generation functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate).

integration_issues.issue: Admin login page (/admin) and dashboard (/admin/dashboard) routes redirect to homepage instead of showing admin interface

passed_tests: Backend API testing (19/19 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Desktop homepage with colorful blue-purple gradient theme
Mobile responsive design - no logo/heading overlap (fixed)
Footer with United Copier company details (address, contact, branch offices)
PDF generation functionality with enhanced design
Search functionality working on desktop and mobile
Product cards with gradient colors and proper styling
Product details modal working on mobile and desktop
Gradient colors on buttons, headings, and category badges
Price display with gradient text effects
All interactive elements working on mobile view

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, minor routing issue)
success_percentage.integration: 95% (PDF generation and WhatsApp integration working perfectly)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin routing issue: Admin login page (/admin) and dashboard (/admin/dashboard) routes are redirecting to homepage instead of displaying the admin interface. Backend admin APIs are fully functional, but frontend routing needs to be fixed.
